metadata.name: Sister Moon
metadata.description:
She burned bright, a lunar extension.  
Waited for the night to find her path.  
What happened to the dreams of the past?  
Wondering how it all could last.  
Darkness and light, they intertwine,  
In a tumultuous battle, hard to define.  
Glimmers of hope, the sky a sickly hue.  
Leaving the past, moving on.  
A new beginning, a new dawn...
